ygData.subject: Re: Re:What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nothing wrong with being different.  However, I would not choose to wear those items because of their weight.  I know that the Lizzy Mantle weighs 2.5
ygData.messageBody:
"John N. Mosqueda" wrote:
>
> From: "John N. Mosqueda" <mosquito@...>
>
> At 03:27 PM 2/6/00 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: Clarity <roderick.duncan@...>
> >
> >Actually shiverback has the monk GM look- same as cured. So the
> level
> >50 monks do have some of the same look as the level 1-20s.
> >
> >And I'm willing to make a very big bet that 95% of level 30-45 monks
> are
> >wearing cured in at least one place- shoulders. :) The other 5% are
> >wearing mesh there.
> >
> >
> >Clarity Harvestmoon,
> >Karana
>
> Let me throw off your statistics by saying I have worn Rusty Spike
> Shoulder
> pads and currently have a Lizzy Mantle (5 AC) on my shoulder, never
> mesh or
> cured... Dare to be different! : )
>
> In Quellious's Name,
>
> Manjushri Bodhisattva
> Bearer of the Red Sash of the Ashen Order
> (Fennin Ro)
> ----------------------------------------------------------------------
> [ONElist Sponsor]
> Please click above to support our sponsor
> ----------------------------------------------------------------------

Nothing wrong with being different. However, I would not choose to wear
those items because of their weight. I know that the Lizzy Mantle
weighs 2.5 which is quite a bit.

--

Hammeron
Monk of Quellious
Karana

--
Worlord
worlord@...
